General.Name: Nexen Tire Prf 1
General.Description: Nexen Tire Corporation engages in the production, sale, and rental of tires in South Korea and internationally. The company offers passenger car, SUV, van and light truck, and solid tires, as well as tubes and flaps; and tire finder and warranty services. It also provides services in the non-tire sector, including transport and storage, and molding, as well as confectionery and baking. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Yangsan-si, South Korea.
